original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1271)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(816)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並暈眩武將<color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(128)@</color> 秒，同時在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4323)@</color> 秒內自身會有一層無敵護盾。
text: <color=#FFE787>Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1271)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(816)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy in front of you, and stuns the general <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(128)@</color> seconds, at the same time in <color=#ccffcc>$ Status_duration(4323)@</color> There will be an invincible shield within seconds.
